page.title: 04Industry
page.content: Sutton on Trent has some light industries in the village:_ a computer firm, a knitting firm, a plastics firm, an electronics firm, a gravel company, a wooden buildings firm. B.W.B. ----- B.W.B. make electronic fruit machines. They supply them to leisure centres, public houses and cafes. They advertise in local papers. They employ some villagers. The firm is sited at Sutton because the A1 motorway gives easy access to places all over the country. Government laws and taxes have an effect on their profit margin, as does the C.B.I.
